/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. Trees dot the landscape, their green foliage contrasting with the urban environment. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
